componentId.description: A unique ID assigned by the system to the component.

componentName.description: A user-defined name for the component.

deleted.description: Indicates if the component is deleted. A value of `true` indicates a deleted status, whereas `false` indicates an active status.

description.description:
Description of the component. 

>**Note:** Although this field is in the object, operations do not support the field. For example, the system ignores the field if it is present in a QUERY, CREATE, or UPDATE request.
description.example: Shared Organization component for Best Wholesaling

folderId.description: The ID of the folder in which the component currently resides.

folderName.description: The folder location of the component within Component Explorer.
